title: The Cougar Hunter
overview: Award winning director Jonathan Morgan directs an all star cast that includes Lisa Ann, Nicole Sheridan, Priya Rai and more in his latest comedy classic! This is the almost true story about animal expert Kangaroo Jack (Voodoo). He's recently focused his research from the outback of Australia to America's suburbs to investigate a rash of cougar sightings.  Comedy ensues as Jack attempts to identify the various species while trying to avoid becoming prey to the cunning cougars. Will Kangaroo Jack be able to keep these carnal felines caged or will more young, hot studs fall victim to the incredibly horny cougars...
